report.title: List events with postcode search.
report.description: Get a list of events for display on the My Events page.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavHistoric on lavHistoric.location_id=l.id AND lavHistoric.location_attribute_id=#historic_attr_id# AND lavHistoric.deleted=false WHERE 1=1 AND #website_filter# AND (l.location_type_id=#core_square_type_id#) AND l.deleted=false AND (#distance_from_post_code# != 0 OR '#return_all_squares#'='true') AND (lavHistoric.id IS NULL OR lavHistoric.int_value = 0) #filters#
report.params:
l.location_type_id=#square_type_id_chosen_by_user#
--Not required, needed if you want the not_excluded and excluded columns to output correct data
st_dwithin(ST_GeomFromText('#post_code_geom#',3857), ST_Transform(l.centroid_geom,3857), #distance_from_post_code#)
